description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Pizza + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken Pizza + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 20 g leftover* cooked lean chicken breast

recipeInstructions.text: Muffins: To make pear & carrot muffins, preheat oven to 180oC/160oC fanforced. Line a 12-hole 1/3 cup capacity muffin pan with paper cases. Place flour in a large bowl and stir in sugar, carrot and three-quarters of the pear. Whisk egg and milk together in a jug. Add to flour mixture and stir until just combined. Divide mixture among paper cases. Top muffins with remaining pear. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Set aside to cool for 5 minutes. Remove from pan and transfer to a wire rack to cool completely. Makes 12. Place 1 muffin in lunch box.

Muffins: To make pear & carrot muffins, preheat oven to 180oC/160oC fanforced. Line a 12-hole 1/3 cup capacity muffin pan with paper cases. Place flour in a large bowl and stir in sugar, carrot and three-quarters of the pear. Whisk egg and milk together in a jug. Add to flour mixture and stir until just combined. Divide mixture among paper cases. Top muffins with remaining pear. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Set aside to cool for 5 minutes. Remove from pan and transfer to a wire rack to cool completely. Makes 12. Place 1 muffin in lunch box.

Muffins: To make pear & carrot muffins, preheat oven to 180oC/160oC fanforced. Line a 12-hole 1/3 cup capacity muffin pan with paper cases. Place flour in a large bowl and stir in sugar, carrot and three-quarters of the pear. Whisk egg and milk together in a jug. Add to flour mixture and stir until just combined. Divide mixture among paper cases. Top muffins with remaining pear. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Set aside to cool for 5 minutes. Remove from pan and transfer to a wire rack to cool completely. Makes 12. Place 1 muffin in lunch box.
